plugin.label: gong
plugin.name: Gong model
plugin.p: A physical model of a metal gong.
Based on Josep Comajuncosas' gong explorer, which was built in Sync Modular, it uses 8 linear waveguides with nonlinear filters to model the gong surface.

port.label: damp_i
port.name: Inner damping
port.p: Controls the degree of damping in the centre of the gong.

port.label: damp_o
port.name: Outer damping
port.p: Controls the degree of damping on the edge of the gong.

port.label: micpos
port.name: Mic position
port.p: Controls the vertical position of the "microphone", 0 is the centre and 1 is the edge.

port.label: scale0
port.name: Inner size 1
port.p: The size of the upper, inner waveguide.

port.label: apa0
port.name: Inner stiffness 1 +
port.p: The stiffness of the gong against deflections in the positive direction.

port.label: apb0
port.name: Inner stiffness 1 -
port.p: The stiffness of the gong against deflections in the negative direction.
